title: The.Charles.Chaplin.Revue.(1959)DvDrip.xvid.dubago77
description: The Chaplin Revue is a 1959 film comprising three silent movies made by Charlie Chaplin. The three shorts included are A Dog&#039;s Life, Shoulder Arms and The Pilgrim. All three star Chaplin&#039;s trademark character, The Tramp. For the 1959 release, Chaplin added a soundtrack to help appeal to modern audiences. Chaplin also added extra footage including clips from World War I to express the context. He provides a personal introduction to each of the clips.
